creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: new blue lining forms border on front; top square panel of cross stitch geometric pattern surrounded by applied and corded bands in reds, green; lower rectangle overlapping panel has two squares and narrow center embroidery in reds and green surrounded by multicolored applied tape; wider pink geometric embroidery surrounds all
title: Baby Carrier
